StoryText: Me and my coworker %FullName:NPC:1% are fooling around in the break room and accidentally break the table.
Question: What should we do?

OptionText.Text: Leave the break room, pretend we know nothing
Try to buy a new table to replace it
Tell our boss we'll work to replace the table.

OptionResult.Result: We try to sneak out of the break room but someone sees us and tells our boss %FullName:NPC:2% what we did.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:2% is so mad at us, we get yelled at for about an hour. Afterwards me and %FullName:NPC:1% get in an argument about whose fault it was. I am so annoyed, so angry, but everyone else at work thinks we are hilarious and called us "The Table Breakers" which isn't the worst nickname I guess.

OptionResult.Result: We find a table online for $100 that we split and bring into the break room.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Thanks to our quick thinking, %FullName:NPC:1% were able to find a similar table, get the seller to bring it to us and sneak it up into the break room when our boss %FullName:NPC:2% isn't paying attention. %Pron:2:1% never even finds out! But we're each out $50.

OptionResult.Result: Our boss %FullName:2% has us work on our next day off and takes the money for a new table out of our checks.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:2% is happy we told %Pron:2:2% the truth. We work on our next day off and %FullName:NPC:2% takes the money out of our checks to pay for a table, however, we still end up earning some extra money. It was a long day, a lot of physical labor, but at least we didn't get in trouble!
